fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.examples.thermostat

Class AbstractWall

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
          • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.examples.thermostat.AbstractPlottingHIOA
            • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.examples.thermostat.AbstractWall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VariableDefinitionsAndSharingI, VariableInitialisationI, AtomicModelI, EventsExchangingI, ModelI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InsideWall, OutsideWall

    @ModelExportedVariable(name="wallTemperature",type=java.lang.Double.class) @ModelExportedVariable(name="wallInsulationConstant",type=java.lang.Double.class)
public abstract class AbstractWall
extends AbstractPlottingHIOA
    The abstract class AbstractWall implements common data and behaviours for wall atomic HIOA models.

    Description

    This class builds over the plotting behaviour of AbstractPlottingHIOA. It introduces two model variables: the wall temperature and the wall insulation transfer constant that is used in the differential equation of the heater atomic HIOA model. It also defines the evaluation step for these variables.

    The insulation transfer constant, as its name indicates, does not change over time (at least at the timespan considered in this example), so it may appear a bit curious to define it as a model exported variable. But, this choice facilitates the parameterisation of its value and then its sharing with the heater model that needs it to compute the current room temperature.

    • Imported events: none
    • Exported events: none
    • Imported variables: none
    • Exported variables: name = wallTemperature, type = Double; name = wallInsulationConstant, type = Double

    Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariants

    Created on : 2022-07-11

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setSimulationRunParameters

        public void setSimulationRunParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> simParams)
                                throws MissingRunParameterException
        Description copied from interface: ModelI
        set the simulation parameters for a simulation run.

        Description

        This method is the same as fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.SimulationManagementI#setSimulationRunParameters(java.util.Map). It could be factored out in a separate interface, but maybe a too complicated solution for just one method.

        Contract

         pre     simParams != null && simParams.size() > 0
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        setSimulationRunParameters in interface ModelI
        Overrides:
        setSimulationRunParameters in class AbstractPlottingHIOA
        Parameters:
        simParams - map from parameters names to their values.
        Throws:
        MissingRunParameterException - if an expected run parameter does not appear in simParams (including simParams being null).
        See Also:
        AbstractPlottingHIOA.setSimulationRunParameters(Map)
